name: 3dttest++
author: AFNI Developers
description: Gosset (Student) t-test of sets of 3D datasets in AFNI

inputs.description: Set A in short form, e.g., 'a+tlrc[3]' b+tlrc[3] ...'
inputs.name: -setA

inputs.description: Set B in short form, e.g., 'x+tlrc[3]' y+tlrc[3] ...'
inputs.name: -setB

inputs.description: Specify an overall name for the set of datasets (Long form). Example: -setA Green sub001 a+tlrc[3] sub002 b+tlrc[3] ...
inputs.name: -setA (Long Form)

inputs.description: Specify an overall name for the set of datasets (Long form). Example: -setB Blue sub001 x+tlrc[3] sub002 y+tlrc[3] ...
inputs.name: -setB (Long Form)

inputs.description: File containing covariates.
inputs.name: -covariates

inputs.description: Label for the set (for Set A). Limited to 12 characters.
inputs.name: -labelA

inputs.description: Label for the set (for Set B). Limited to 12 characters.
inputs.name: -labelB

inputs.description: File with voxel-wise weights for -setA datasets.
inputs.name: -setweightA

inputs.description: File with voxel-wise weights for -setB datasets.
inputs.name: -setweightB

inputs.description: Output the prefix name of the dataset result. For surface-based datasets, use -prefix p.niml.dset or -prefix p.gii.dset
inputs.name: -prefix

inputs.description: Residuals will be output into a dataset with the given prefix.
inputs.name: -resid

inputs.description: Specify to use a paired-sample t-test to compare setA and setB. Both sets must have the same cardinality.
inputs.name: -paired

inputs.description: Specify separate variance estimates for setA and setB (not pooled together).
inputs.name: -unpooled

inputs.description: Set mask for dataset analysis.
inputs.name: -mask

inputs.description: Add extra Gaussian blurring kernel FWHM (mm). Example: -exblur 6
inputs.name: -exblur

inputs.description: Randomize signs of datasets. Used with output from -resid to generate null hypothesis statistics.
inputs.name: -randomsign

inputs.description: With -randomsign, adds inter-set permutation to randomization when both sets are used.
inputs.name: -permute

inputs.description: Apply the Equitable Thresholding And Clustering (ETAC) method for thresholding results.
inputs.name: -ETAC

inputs.description: List of multiple levels of spatial blurring for ETAC. Example: -ETAC_blur 4 6
inputs.name: -ETAC_blur

inputs.description: Specify options for ETAC. Example: -ETAC_opt NN=2:sid=2:hpow=0,2:pthr=0.01,0.005,0.002,0.01:name=Fred
inputs.name: -ETAC_opt

inputs.description: Random number seed for -randomsign and -permute/ETAC.
inputs.name: -seed
